mapper.select: /* kr.or.hku.admin.mapper.ClassCancelledMapper.getClassCancelledList */ SELECT a.subcl_no AS subcl_no , a.lecap_no AS lecap_no , d.sub_nm AS sub_nm , a.pro_no AS pro_no , b.pro_nm AS pro_nm , a.suncl_rsn AS suncl_rsn , a.subcl_aply_dt AS subcl_aply_dt , a.subcl_aply_wk AS subcl_aply_wk FROM subject_cancel a INNER JOIN professor b ON a.pro_no = b.pro_no INNER JOIN lecture_aply c ON a.lecap_no = c.lecap_no INNER JOIN subject d ON c.sub_no = d.sub_no ORDER BY a.subcl_no DESC

/* kr.or.hku.admin.mapper.ClassCancelledMapper.getStdInLecture */ SELECT b.std_no ,b.std_nm ,b.std_telno ,c.dept_nm FROM course_regist a INNER join student b ON a.std_no = b.std_no INNER join department c ON b.dept_cd = c.dept_cd WHERE a.lecap_no = 12
